name: drying_getRemainingTime
description: This function is used to get the remaining drying time from the dryer.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to get the remaining time.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment to get the remaining time.
